k8s_cluster_name.name: k8s_cluster_name
k8s_cluster_name.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_cluster_name'))
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day WHERE metric_name like 'k8s%' AND unix_milli >= toUnixTimestamp(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 1000

k8s_node_name.name: k8s_node_name
k8s_node_name.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_node_name'))
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day WHERE metric_name like 'k8s%' AND unix_milli >= toUnixTimestamp(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 1000

widgets.description:
The average queue length of the requests that were issued to the device. It was previously known as Disk I/Os Weighted.
Unit: aqu-sq - dimensionless (number of queued operations)
widgets.title: Average Queue Size (aqu-sz)

promql.name: A
promql.query: sum by(k8s_node_name) (system_filesystem_usage{k8s_cluster_name="{{.k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name="{{.k8s_node_name}}",state="used",device!~"/dev/loop.*", device!~"tmpfs|nsfs"}) / sum by(k8s_node_name) (system_filesystem_usage{k8s_cluster_name="{{.k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name="{{.k8s_node_name}}",device!~"/dev/loop.*", device!~"tmpfs|nsfs"})
